attributes.action: immediately reject and refuse to recognise (on behalf of and with the full support of  the taxpayers of this country) any claim by Shahid Malik that he has been singled out because he is Muslim, in the embezzlement of expenses revelations currently being promulgated in the Daily Telegraph.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I watched his live rant on TV this morning (15 May 2009) and on a number of occasions he made the statement 'it is obvious why this has happened' and I now fully expect to hear that he has pulled the racism card.  This cannot be further from the truth.  He has been singled out because he is an embezzler and a thief of taxpayer pounds.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
